@caguero , it seems that Dockerhub made some changes to the way automated builds are set up: https://success.docker.com/article/i-have-issues-triggering-autobuilds

Currently, only Owners can establish the link between Dockerhub and bitbucket that is required for automated builds. I think that once the link is established, I can configure the builds as an admin. Also, in response to your question about what account credentials were used previously: I'm not sure what the requirements were before, but now Dockerhub's recommendation is that organizations create a service user associated with the repository and use this user to establish the link so it doesn't break when real users leave the organization or change permissions.

Would it be possible for someone at OSRF to help us set this up?
